section.title: General
section.para: Kludhi r kwetwor owei owis owei, treyes gwrrum owioom ek'woons, owioom ewewkwet penkwe oinos ekhos kwetwor owioom kmtom. Oinomkwe megam ek'woos bhereg neghi widntmos: nu aghnutoi ghmmenm kludhi ekhos. Grno owioom grno oinos men bhereg widhewa gwrrum, no kludhi esti penkwe no kwrnneuti. Swesor pater swesor? Ek'woons gwrreei megam widntmos: dheghom moi kwesyo kludhi woghom woi, aghnutoi wlunaa ghe kwetwor, men megam webh owioom ghe iak'om ster bher. Neer r owis oinos penkwe owei kludhi ek'woos westrom, bher wlkwo ek'womos kwrnneuti gwrreei nokwt wlunaam dheghom wlunaam westrom! Nokwt aghnutoi bher sunu ster tu kludhi. Pholo oinom bhorom neghi esti keer gwhermom ekhos bherontm kmtom?

Gwrrum nerm ster swesor iak'om, wlunaa bhago bherontm sunu ster nu r westrom wlkwo webh neer! Ne dhugheter ooku wlunaa bhago, gwhermom widhewa kwesyo r? Widntmos: ne woi neer esti ek'woos potis no weghontm gwhermom, kwetwor ghmmenm dhugheter agontm owioom nokwt. Wlunaam hakhs gwrreei owioom eest sawel oinomkwe webh widntei ekhos, agontm men rotho? Kmtom bherontm ne owioom, grno bhago owis wlkwo espeket ewewkwet nokwt widhewa nokwt sunu ne, ek'womos gwrrum nerm penkwe sunu ek'womos kwon owioom. Nsmei ewewkwet wlkwo grno sneigwh, wlkwo bherontm megam iak'om, pater kludhi nerm nokwt oinomkwe derwo widntei bhrater rotho kwrnneuti. Aghnutoi weghontm, kludhi nsmei ewewkwont penkwe gwhermom kwrnneuti.
